directions: In a large bowl, mix the yogurt, onion, and mint. Place the beef cubes in the mixture. Cover, and marinate at least 6 hours in the refrigerator.
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat.
Place the marinated beef cubes on skewers, and grill, turning occasionally, 15 minutes, or to desired doneness.
ingredients: 2 pounds beef top sirloin, cut into large cubes
title: Persian Kabob
